item.description:
We are fortunate to have Jon Finn and Dave Shaheen Duo again at Old Amsterdam Bar Lounge in Nashua, NH this wed., 7/25th 8:30-11PM. Last gig there last month had 15 members, and great time was had by all! Both accomplished performers in their own right; they are together again with acoustic and electric guitars, and beautiful harmonies. Sometimes surprise performers; yu never know?!
**arrive early for seat, and bite around 7-7:30pm. Co-hosted by Bon Bailey and Patricia [but,unavoidably, I am arriving later from my job in Boston; so the Great and Ever Humble, Don Bailey will hold down the fort for early arrivals]. Great drink and nibbles off the menu by Jared and Team. Free Parking, NO cover [which yu will find incredible when yu see them!], AC!!
of course. Don's cell # 603 724-9402 to confirm early seating, please.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Classic Rock and Acoustic w/ Jon and Dave Duo this wed.7/25 in Nashua
